hero.headline: Create with AI, not through it.
hero.description: Move beyond the black box with a visual studio and AI agent that work beside you. Your creativity leads, our AI executes.

partnership.label: The Difference
partnership.heading: Collaboration, Not Delegation.
partnership.description: Prompt-to-video tools remove you from the creative process. Traditional editors leave you doing everything alone. Motif is neither — it's a shared workspace where human imagination and AI expertise meet.

cards.title: Prompt-to-Video Tools
items: Type a prompt, hope the AI guesses right
Zero control over composition or timing
Your creative vision gets lost in translation

cards.title: Creating with Motif
items: Design hands-on while AI accelerates your work
Full control — adjust, override, refine anything
Your style, your choices, amplified by AI
The agent adapts to you, not the other way around

workflow.label: The Workflow
workflow.heading: You Create. AI Amplifies.
workflow.description: Start from a blank canvas or a conversation — either way, you stay in the driver's seat.

steps.title: Start Your Way
steps.description: Build visually with drag-and-drop, ask the AI agent to scaffold a scene, or combine both. You choose how much creative control to keep at every step.

steps.title: Create Together
steps.description: Work side by side with the agent. It suggests transitions, generates assets, and improves timing — you accept, tweak, or override. Every decision is yours.

steps.title: Export & Ship
steps.description: Render broadcast-quality video straight from your browser. No external software. No cloud queues. Your animation, your creative fingerprint — ready to publish.

ecosystem.label: The Engine
ecosystem.heading: Best of Both Worlds.
ecosystem.description: The efficiency and expertise of a trained AI agent. The originality and taste that only a human brings. Together.

features.title: AI Creative Partner
features.description: Not a black box — a collaborator. The agent suggests, generates, and refines, but you always have the final say.

features.title: 100+ Presets & Effects
features.description: Production-ready animations, transitions, and effects — from subtle fades to 3D perspective flips. Apply with one click, customize to make them yours.

features.title: Visual + Code Editing
features.description: Design visually with drag-and-drop controls. Drop into code for full precision. Both stay perfectly in sync.

features.title: Instant Preview
features.description: See every change as you make it. No render wait, no preview queue. What you see is what you export.

features.title: On-the-Fly Asset Generation
features.description: Need a shape, gradient, or element? Ask the agent — it creates it in context while you keep designing.

features.title: Browser-Native Export
features.description: Render to broadcast-quality video directly in your browser. No plugins, no installs, no cloud dependencies.
